By embedding the mother fund decision investment support module in the mother fund investment management system, the investment process is optimized, the system operation is more intelligent and automatic, comprehensive information integration is realized, the data processing efficiency is improved, the complete scheduling time is shortened, the investment efficiency is improved, the overall performance of the mother fund investment management system is improved, and the risk is reduced. column12: Personalized investment recommendation system based on large language model
column13: The invention discloses a personalized investment recommendation system based on a large language model, which optimizes an investment strategy and ensures the diversity and personalization of an investment portfolio by identifying new investment factors in a market and generating a personalized factor combination according to the investment style, market preference and risk tolerance of a user. Meanwhile, the analysis and evaluation module generates market emotion indexes through emotion analysis of financial news, social media information and company announcements. The emotion index increases consideration of an emotion level for investment suggestions, so that an investment decision is not only based on rational data analysis, but also can reflect emotional fluctuation of the market. Through the synergistic effect of the two modules, the recommendation system can provide more accurate and dynamically adaptive investment suggestions, and the requirements of users and the actual dynamic state of the market are better met.

column12: Financial fraud detection method based on large language model
column13: The invention provides a financial fraud detection method based on a large language model. The method comprises the steps of obtaining a to-be-recognized text; performing word segmentation on the to-be-recognized text through the target word segmentation tool and the financial fraud dictionary, and determining a fraud sensitive word list; calculating the weight of each sensitive word in the sensitive word list according to a target algorithm to obtain a sensitive word weight feature vector; inputting the sensitive word weight feature vector and a to-be-recognized text into a large language model, and determining a context semantic vector of the sensitive word in combination with a word embedding technology; determining the similarity between the context semantic vector of the sensitive word and a preset financial fraud type semantic vector; and determining a financial fraud type according to the similarity. Through the implementation of the method, the generalization ability of the pre-training model is utilized to capture text deep semantics, priori knowledge is injected in combination with a sensitive word weight mechanism, the model is guided to focus high-risk vocabularies, the defect of a traditional method in semantic comprehension is overcome, the financial fraud recognition rate is increased, and the omission ratio is reduced.

column12: Financial news editing method based on large language model

Aiming at the problem that a news auxiliary processing scheme in the prior art can only process text news contents, the method comprises the following steps of: firstly splitting original video contents to obtain segmented videos corresponding to different expression semantics, and inputting news materials of to-be-processed texts into a hybrid expert model on the basis, so as to extract content abstracts; and the segmented videos are matched and organized, so that the processing efficiency of the multimedia news is improved.

column12: Large language model knowledge graph construction method in financial field
column13: The invention discloses a big language model knowledge graph construction method in the financial field, which performs relation extraction by introducing a deep learning algorithm, and integrates and verifies financial data from different data sources by using a field ontology and an inference engine. The problem of data integration caused by inconsistent data formats, entity redundancy and conflicts in a traditional method is solved, so that the accuracy and consistency of knowledge graph construction are greatly improved. According to the method, the problems caused by non-uniform names or data redundancy in different financial institutions, market reports and government files can be effectively eliminated, the calculation complexity is reduced, and the query efficiency is improved. And secondly, an intelligent question-answering system based on a natural language is introduced, so that the technical threshold of the user is reduced, and non-technical personnel can query and analyze financial data without mastering a complex query language.

column12: Financial risk assessment method and device based on large language model
column13: The invention discloses a financial risk assessment method and device based on a large language model. The method comprises the following steps: acquiring historical data of a user and external scene variable data, and preprocessing the acquired historical data of the user; constructing an input vector according to the preprocessed historical data of the user and the external scene variable data; using a large language model to generate a user future behavior sequence based on a condition generation technology; adding a time dimension into the future behavior sequence of the user to obtain dynamic change data of the user behavior along with time t; and obtaining a risk feature mean value based on the dynamic change number of the user behavior along with the time t, and calculating a comprehensive risk score through weighted summation. According to the method, the large language model is applied to financial user behavior prediction, the future behavior sequence of the user under the external scene variable is generated through the condition generation technology, and the scientificity and accuracy of risk assessment are improved.

column12: Large language model prediction and evaluation method for financial statement analysis
column13: The invention discloses a large language model prediction and evaluation method for financial statement analysis. The method comprises the following steps: collecting and arranging original financial statement data; anonymization processing and standardization processing are sequentially carried out on the financial statement data; designing a structured thinking chain prompt based on the financial statement data after anonymization processing and standardization processing; inputting the financial statement data subjected to anonymization processing and standardization processing and the thinking chain prompt into a large language model, so that the large language model performs prediction according to the thinking chain prompt; the prediction result output by the large language model is evaluated from multiple dimensions, if the evaluation result of each dimension is within a set error range, an analysis report is generated according to the prediction result, and otherwise, the designed thinking chain prompt is optimized. According to the method, the data processing efficiency is improved, the analysis dimension and depth are improved, and the subjectivity and consistency in analysis are improved.

column12: Financial statement automatic analysis system based on large language model
column13: The invention discloses a financial statement automatic analysis system based on a large language model. The financial statement automatic analysis system comprises a financial analysis DSL generation large model, a financial analysis DSL filter and a financial analysis DSL decoder. When the system receives at least one financial statement analysis request in a natural language form, a financial analysis DSL primary script is automatically generated by a financial analysis DSL generation large model, the primary script is input into a financial analysis DSL filter to obtain a financial analysis DSL complete script, then the complete script is input into a financial analysis DSL decoder to be decoded, and the financial statement analysis request is sent to the financial analysis DSL decoder. And obtaining a prompt text containing a financial analysis result and a knowledge text, and returning financial analysis and explanation to a user interface in a plain text form by the inference model. According to the financial statement automatic analysis system based on the large language model, the financial analysis report of the natural language request is automatically generated, and the efficiency and accuracy of financial statement analysis are remarkably improved.

column12: Financial financing planning scheme providing system based on large language model
column13: The invention provides a financial financing planning scheme providing system based on a large language model, and the system improves the accuracy and efficiency of processing financial planning problems by constructing a training data set in the financial field, finely adjusting a basic large language model and designing a retrieval enhancement generation component. column12: Method and device for realizing financial system data asset identification processing based on large language model, processor and readable storage medium thereof
column13: The invention relates to a method for realizing financial system data asset identification processing based on a large language model. The method comprises the following steps: carrying out data preprocessing; constructing a three-section cue word template; introducing retrieval enhancement generation, and performing supplementary description on the integrated data; performing parameter fine tuning on the open source model through low-rank adaptation and noise embedding; obtaining a sensitive data identification expert large model through a distributed training framework; model reasoning is accelerated, and a binary classification result of the sensitive data is obtained. The invention also relates to a device for realizing financial system data asset identification processing based on the large language model, a processor and a computer readable storage medium thereof. By adopting the method and device for realizing financial system data asset identification processing based on the large language model, the processor and the computer readable storage medium thereof, the manual annotation cost is remarkably reduced, the sensitive data identification speed and efficiency are improved, meanwhile, the generalization ability is better, and the method and device are suitable for popularization and application. The application effect of sensitive data identification in the professional financial field can be improved.

column12: Semantic understanding method and system based on text information of dialogue system in financial field
column13: The invention provides a semantic understanding method and system based on text information of a dialogue system in the financial field. The semantic understanding method comprises the steps of collecting question text data of a user; preprocessing the text data, and sorting the preprocessed data; respectively constructing a domain identification model according to the sorted data, and determining multi-intention data and corresponding slot position data; constructing a multi-intention recognition and slot extraction multi-task joint model according to the multi-intention data and the corresponding slot data; and respectively iteratively training the field identification model and the multi-task joint model to obtain a field corresponding to the user question text and an intention and a slot position corresponding to each sentence in the user question text, thereby completing semantic understanding of the user question text. Semantic understanding is performed more finely and accurately through factor classification of user questions, dialogue answers are generated, and a dialogue semantic understanding task in the specific financial field is completed. And meanwhile, the problems of poor training timeliness and performance of a traditional cascade model are solved.

column12: Enterprise financial risk control decision support method based on DTW-RNN and LLM
column13: The invention discloses an enterprise financial risk control decision support method based on DTW-RNN and LLM, and mainly relates to the field of financial risk control. Comprising the following steps: cleaning and normalizing enterprise financial data to ensure data quality and consistency; the DTW technology is utilized to align and match data of different time sequences, and the problem of data length inconsistency is solved; combining neural network structures such as DTW, a recurrent neural network (RNN) and a long short-term memory (LSTM) to construct a risk control model; dividing a data set into a training set and a test set, performing model training through a back propagation algorithm, and performing model optimization through methods such as cross validation; and according to a model prediction result, a risk assessment report and decision suggestions are provided for an enterprise, and the enterprise is helped to carry out risk control and decision making. The method has the advantages that the risk management level can be improved, enterprise managers can be helped to better understand and manage risks, and the risk management level is improved.

column12: Financial customer service dialogue generation method and device based on LLM model, equipment and medium
column13: The invention discloses a financial customer service dialogue generation method and device based on an LLM model, computer equipment and a storage medium, and the method comprises the steps: obtaining a target question, and converting the target question into a target question vector; according to the target problem vector, searching in a financial problem vector library to obtain N similar problem vectors Ngt; 2; sorting the N similar problem vectors according to a financial service scene identifier, and selecting M similar problem vectors, Mlt, matched with the financial service scene identifier; n; according to the M similar question vectors, retrieving in a question and answer pair database to obtain M question and answer pair vector groups; generating a scene question and answer prompt template according to the target question vector, the financial service scene identifier and the M question and answer pair vector groups; and inputting the scene question and answer prompt template into an LLM model, and outputting target answer text information. The method improves the accuracy of financial customer service dialogues.
